QuestData.Title: Stop the Plague
QuestData.Description: I'm convinced that the plague is being caused by something in the caves up there.$B$B$C, I want you to take these seeds. I normally use them as a ward against the Scourge, though perhaps they can be used to disrupt whatever foulness is happening in the dens.$B$BFind the source of the plague and throw them into it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sage Highmesa, standing just south of The Dens of Dying, has asked you to use Highmesa's Cleansing Seeds at a Den of Dying Plague Cauldron to neutralize it.
QuestData.CompletionText: Either cave should do, $c. Quickly, use the seeds to end the plague!
QuestData.RewardText: <The sage hangs her head and sighs in relief.>$B$BThis is a good start. If only that were our only problem.
